title: Install and Set Up
description: Get AutoTester ready in your browser
content:
• Install the AutoTester Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store
• Pin the extension to your browser toolbar for easy access
• Create your first project by clicking the AutoTester icon
• Enter your project details:
  • Project name (choose something descriptive)
  • Application URL (the web app you want to test)
  • Brief app description (helps AI understand your application)
• Verify the extension is properly connected to your application

title: Record User Actions
content:
• Navigate to your web application in the same browser tab
• Click the AutoTester extension and press 'Start Recording'
• Perform the complete user workflow you want to test:
  • Fill out all form fields with realistic data
  • Click all relevant buttons and navigation links
  • Complete the entire process from start to finish
  • Include both successful paths and potential error scenarios
  • Navigate through all pages in your workflow
• Stop recording when you've completed the full user journey
• Review the captured actions in the AutoTester interface

title: Define Test Validations
description: Set up checkpoints for your tests
content:
• Review your recorded actions step by step
• Add verification points to check critical elements:
  • Success messages appear correctly after form submissions
  • Error messages display as expected for invalid inputs
  • Required field validations work properly
  • Page navigation occurs correctly after actions
  • Data persists properly across page transitions
• Set up assertions for:
  • Element visibility and text content
  • URL changes and redirects
  • Form validation behaviors
  • Loading states and completion indicators
• Test both positive and negative scenarios

title: AI Generates Comprehensive Test Cases
description: Let AI create your complete test strategy
content:
• AI analyzes your recording and validation points
• AI automatically generates complete test scenarios:
  • Positive test cases for valid inputs and expected user flows
  • Negative test cases for invalid inputs and error conditions
  • Edge cases for boundary values and unusual scenarios
  • Form validation tests for all input fields
  • Navigation and workflow tests for user journeys
  • Cross-browser compatibility considerations
• Review the generated test suite:
  • Verify test coverage meets your requirements
  • Check that critical user paths are included
  • Ensure edge cases are appropriately covered
• Customize or add additional test scenarios as needed

title: AI Creates Executable Test Steps
description: Transform test cases into runnable automation
content:
• AI processes each generated test case into executable steps
• AI creates detailed, step-by-step instructions:
  • Precise element selectors and interaction methods
  • Input data variations for different test scenarios
  • Assertion statements with expected outcomes
  • Wait conditions for dynamic content loading
  • Error handling and recovery procedures
• AI optimizes test steps for:
  • Reliability across different environments
  • Efficiency and execution speed
  • Maintainability and clarity
  • Proper test isolation and cleanup
• Review the complete executable test suite
• Verify that each test step is clear and actionable

title: Execute and Monitor
content:
• Run your complete test suite using AutoTester
• Monitor test execution in real-time:
  • Watch tests interact with your application
  • Observe validation checkpoints being verified
  • Track progress through the test suite
• Review comprehensive test results:
  • Detailed pass/fail status for each test
  • Screenshots of any failures or issues
  • Detailed error messages and stack traces
  • Performance metrics and execution times
• Analyze results to improve your application:
  • Identify bugs and inconsistencies
  • Validate user experience flows
  • Confirm error handling works correctly
  • Verify cross-browser compatibility
• Use insights to fix issues and enhance your application
